title: Various Tests could use settings recommendations
body:
Hi, thanks again for providing this software.

I just did a bunch of various tests mainly messing around with content weight and content style to try to achieve various looks.  I just posted a blog post about my findings which will be a guide for me in the future on what settings I want to use to get the result I'm looking for.  I figured I would share it here if thats ok and if you have any other suggestions on options I could try.

https://ibareitall.com/neural-style-transfer-tests/

![style-transfer](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/519563/95666592-0834ea80-0b10-11eb-811c-61d86e46d0b8.jpg)
![neural-style-none](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/519563/95666587-f81d0b00-0b0f-11eb-9985-db37b8f40784.jpg)
![neural-style-10](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/519563/95666588-fbb09200-0b0f-11eb-90a4-b3c5eaa15d39.jpg)
![neural-style-10-500](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/519563/95666589-fc492880-0b0f-11eb-92fe-b258c23e9185.jpg)
